'''Incandescent Ode of Resurrection''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.3 update – 2025/02/11 14:59

===Archon Quest Unlock Criteria===
* Adventure Rank 28 or above
* Complete Archon Quest [[Chapter IV]]: Interlude "[[All Fires Fuel the Flame]]"
* In the current version, once you reach Adventure Rank 28 and complete Archon Quest [[Chapter I]]: Act III "[[A New Star Approaches]]," you can use the "[[Quick Start]]" function to unlock Archon Quest Chapter V: Act I "[[Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn]]" and continue progressing up to the latest Archon Quest introduced in the current version update.

===Summary===
* After the Version 5.3 update, Archon Quest Chapter V: Act V will be permanently available. Meet the unlock criteria to unlock said Archon Quest.
* Complete the corresponding Archon Quest within the specified duration to obtain an additional reward of {{Item|Primogem|x=500}}.
